canCompare

public static boolean canCompare(ContextVector cv1,

Checks if the two context vectors can be compared with one another. Decision is based on the basic_type of both vectors.

getCosineSimilarity

public static float getCosineSimilarity(ContextVector cv1,
                                        ContextVector cv2)
Calculates the cosine of the angle between both vectors as a measure of similarity.
cos0 = x * y / (||x|| * ||y||)
A return value of zero means that both vectors are orthogonal.

Parameters:
cv1 -
cv2 -
Returns:

getMinLenNormalizedOverlap

public static float getMinLenNormalizedOverlap(ContextVector cv1,
                                               ContextVector cv2)
Returns the overlap between both context vectors (number of shared elements). Normalizes this absolute number with the length of the shortest of the two vectors.

Parameters:
cv1 -
cv2 -
